title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\InspectConfig_FindingLimits_InfoTypeLimit
name: InspectConfig_FindingLimits_InfoTypeLimit
description:
Max findings configuration per infoType, per content item or long running DlpJob.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.InspectConfig.FindingLimits.InfoTypeLimit

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getInfoType
methods.description:
Type of information the findings limit applies to. Only one limit per info_type should be provided. If InfoTypeLimit does not have an info_type, the DLP API applies the limit against all info_types that are found but not specified in another InfoTypeLimit.

Generated from protobuf field .google.privacy.dlp.v2.InfoType info_type = 1;

methods.name: setInfoType
methods.description:
Type of information the findings limit applies to. Only one limit per info_type should be provided. If InfoTypeLimit does not have an info_type, the DLP API applies the limit against all info_types that are found but not specified in another InfoTypeLimit.

Generated from protobuf field .google.privacy.dlp.v2.InfoType info_type = 1;

params.name: var
params.description: Type of information the findings limit applies to. Only one limit per info_type should be provided. If InfoTypeLimit does not have an info_type, the DLP API applies the limit against all info_types that are found but not specified in another InfoTypeLimit.

methods.name: getMaxFindings
methods.description:
Max findings limit for the given infoType.

Generated from protobuf field int32 max_findings = 2;
